casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Glenwood Earl DOWNEY 85A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 26, 2017 Michele Goldman, Attorney at Law, for Downey, Glenwood Earl. Richard E. Slipsky, Special Deputy Attorney General, Scott T. Stroud, Special Deputy Attorney General, Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 26th of June 2017 by State of NC :

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of June 2017."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 3rd day of July 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
